org.lindbergframework.beans.di
Class BeanMapping

java.lang.Object
  org.lindbergframework.beans.di.BeanMapping

public class BeanMapping
extends java.lang.Object

Class that defines bean mapping inside of IOC context.

Author:
Victor Lindberg

Constructor Detail

BeanMapping

public BeanMapping()
Default construtor for BeanMapping.

BeanMapping

public BeanMapping(java.lang.Class clazz,
                   boolean singleton,
                   java.lang.String id)
Create a BeanMapping for clazz, singleton and id attributes defined.

Parameters:
clazz - bean class.
singleton - true if the bean is a singleton and false if is not a singleton bean.
id - bean id.

Create a new instance for the bean.

Returns:
new bean instance.
Throws:
java.lang.InstantiationException - Could not create bean instance.
